page.title: 20Employment in Besselsleigh
page.content:
Besselsleigh is a hamlet of forty people which capitalizes on its position by the A420(T)road. There is a Hartwells filling station which sells cars, snacks and spares as well as petrol. The Greyhound Public House with its half acre of car-park relies on{food sales}for most of its takings.
Pograine pottery employs one specialist potter who, for the last fourteen years has received commissions for commemorative mugs and other items for churches, fetes and specialist shops. The potter uses red clay from Stoke-on-Trent. Also along the A420 is a kennels specializing in Welsh corgis and German Shepherd dogs.
